item.title: TeleBlock Exception Error [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sly_theft sly theft
item.description:
@sly_theft wrote:

case 1814: if(c.teleblock == true) { c.sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else c.stopMovement(); c.teleX = 3153; c.teleY = 3923; c.npcIndex = 0; c.playerIndex = 0; c.faceUpdate(0); c.startAnimation(714); c.teleTimer = 11; c.teleGfx = 308; c.teleEndAnimation = 715; c.getPA().sound(202); break; case 1815: c.stopMovement(); c.teleX = 2561; c.teleY = 3311; c.npcIndex = 0; c.playerIndex = 0; c.faceUpdate(0); c.startAnimation(714); c.teleTimer = 11; c.teleGfx = 308; c.teleEndAnimation = 715; c.getPA().sound(202); break;

src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:117: cannot find symbol symbol : variable teleblock location: class server.model.players.Client if(c.teleblock == true) { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

No Luck

item.title: TeleBlock Exception Error [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sly_theft sly theft
item.description:
@sly_theft wrote:

Okay so I’m adding an exception to teleporting using levers when teleblocked. Heres my code . . .

case 1814: if(teleblock == true) { c.sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else c.stopMovement(); c.teleX = 3153; c.teleY = 3923; c.npcIndex = 0; c.playerIndex = 0; c.faceUpdate(0); c.startAnimation(714); c.teleTimer = 11; c.teleGfx = 308; c.teleEndAnimation = 715; c.getPA().sound(202); break; case 1815: c.stopMovement(); c.teleX = 2561; c.teleY = 3311; c.npcIndex = 0; c.playerIndex = 0; c.faceUpdate(0); c.startAnimation(714); c.teleTimer = 11; c.teleGfx = 308; c.teleEndAnimation = 715; c.getPA().sound(202); break;

And heres my error …

src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:117: cannot find symbol symbol : variable teleblock location: class server.model.players.ActionHandler if(teleblock == true) { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

I know im forgetting one symbol and I’m not sure how to correctly place it. Any help?

Read full topic
